title: Western Music Collection
description: 20 western-style music tracks; mix of ambient / melodic music (14 Loops, 6 Themes)
longDescription:
Info

This package consists of 20 western-styled compositions which aim to reflect frequent situations within a western game genre, e.g. horse riding, a shootout, etc.

14 tracks are loop-able (indicated by file name) and 6 are themes (designed for menu music, character themes, etc.)


Benefits

  • Music creates an emotional connection for the player to the game - hence increasing engagement with the game
  • Music creates an ambience - hence more immersion for the player
  • Music adds more depth / detail to the game, hence making it more interesting / exciting to play


Listen to the full tracks on Soundcloud;

https://soundcloud.com/kiranaus/sets/the-western-game-music-collection-remastered
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  14 Loops
  • 6 Themes
  •  Unique Western Style
  • Ambient and Melodic Compositions

Number of Audio Wavs: 20

Number of Audio Cues: 20

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: 14 Tracks Loop, 6 Don't Loop (indicated by file name)

Minutes of audio provided: 31.53

Supported Development Platforms: 4.20 - 4.21 and earlier

Supported Target Build Platforms:

  • Android
  • Gear VR
  • HTML5
  • iOS
  • Linux
  • MacOS
  • Oculus
  • PlayStation 4
  • Steam VR
  • Windows 32-bit
  • Windows 64-bit
  • Xbox One

Documentation: None

Important/Additional Notes: contact niceaussieofficial@gmail.com for inquiries
